content:
Every time I sweep up the fallen leaves at the Camp,
New ones appear as soon as I turn around.
Are they blown in by the wind, or is there something else...
info: 幻雪摇树任务闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
I'm not quite accustomed to weather with intense sunlight,
so during times like these,
I prefer to seek refuge beneath the trees.
info: 幻雪摇树任务闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1
幻雪摇树任务闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
First, however, one must shake the tree
to make the branches fall down.
—A lesson learned from personal experience with falling branches.
info: 幻雪摇树任务闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1
